cell.neighbourTools

Class NeighbourTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • cell.neighbourTools.NeighbourTools

  • public class NeighbourTools
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static methods used in analysis of neighbouring Cell objects nested in a CellGrid object.
    See Also:
    CellGrid, Cell

    • Method Detail

      • addInMazeNeighboursToCoordinates

        public static void addInMazeNeighboursToCoordinates(int row,
                                    int col,
                                    MyArrayList<Cell> neighbourCells,
                                    CellGrid grid,
                                    int steps)
        Adds neighbouring Cell objects to the Cell object located at the position defined by the row and column positions in the parameters into a list (defined in the parameters) that are not marked as a part of the maze (i.e. that are unconnected). Also adds the neighbouring Cell objects relative direction to the Cell objects located at the position defined by the row and column positions in the parameters neighbouring mazes directions list.
        Parameters:
        row - the row position of the Cell object thats' neighbouring cells are analysed.
        col - the column position of the Cell object thats' neighbouring cells are analysed.
        neighbourCells - the list into which the neighbouring Cell objects are added.
        grid - the CellGrid object in which the Cell objects are nested
        steps - the distance between the neighbouring Cell objects.

      • connectNeighbourToMaze

        public static void connectNeighbourToMaze(Cell cell,
                          CellGrid grid)
        Connects the Cell object defined in the parameters located in the CellGrid object to the maze to be generated, i.e. marking it as a part of the maze and opening the Cell object between the this current Cell object and a neighbouring Cell object that is already connected to the maze.
        Parameters:
        cell - the Cell object to be connected.
        grid - the CellGrid object where the defined Cell object resides.

      • connect

        public static void connect(Cell cell1,
           Cell cell2,
           CellGrid grid)
        Essentially the same as the connectNeighbourToMaze method, but doing it to two predefined Cell objects instead of doing it pseudo-randomly. Steps between Cell objects is 2.

      • getOpenNeighboursToCoordinatesAndSetDistAndParent

        public static MyArrayList getOpenNeighboursToCoordinatesAndSetDistAndParent(CellGrid grid,
                                                            Cell parent)
        A method intended to be used by a pathsolving algorithm. It adds all neighbouring Cell objects, that have either not been processed before or would have a lower cost to the beginning after the addition, to a list and finally returns the list.
        Parameters:
        grid - the CellGrid object where the Cell objects are nested.
        parent - the Cell object thats' neighbours are analysed.
        Returns:
        a list containing the appropriate neighbouring Cell objects.
